    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Stretching of a spring and rubber band</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnen eines Frühlinges und des Gummibandes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étirage d'une bande élastique de ressort et</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esticar de uma mola e de uma faixa de borracha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allungamento di un elastico e del molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέντωμα ενός ελατηρίου και μιας λαστιχένιας ζώνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estirar de una goma del resorte y</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These line graphs show the change in the length of a spring (top) and a rubber band (bottom) with weight.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Extension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">length</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber band</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stretching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigen Zeile Diagramme die Änderung in der
Länge eines Frühlinges (Oberseite) und des Gummibandes (Unterseite) 
mit Gewicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphes par ligne montrent le changement de la
longueur d'un ressort (dessus) et d'une bande élastique (bas) avec le
poids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este a linha gráficos mostra a mudança no 
comprimento de uma mola (alto) e de uma faixa de borracha (fundo) com 
peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafici lineari mostra il cambiamento nella
lunghezza di una molla (parte superiore) e di un elastico (parte 
inferiore) con peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις γραμμών εμφανίζουν την 
αλλαγή στο μήκος ενός ελατηρίου (κορυφή) και λαστιχένια ζώνη 
(κατώτατο σημείο) με το βάρος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este la línea gráficos muestra el cambio en la 
longitud de un resorte (tapa) y de una goma (fondo) con el peso.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
